name: PONG+ (SESAME)
description:
Grab a friend to play this twist on a classic game! Play with additional abilities, themes, and effects to amp up the intensity of the game. PONG+ is local multiplayer with just one keyboard--no extra controllers required.

This game is currently in development with just a few things to iron out:

  • Colored particles
  • UI distortion
  • Game fade on pause
  • General debugging
